rationale: Due to the cumulative impact of the major threats affecting the species over its range, it is thought that this species almost meets the threshold for qualifying as Vulnerable under criterion A. Currently there is the potential of a 20% decline in the species across Africa.
assessor: Appleton, C., Kristensen, T.K., Lange, C.N., Stensgaard, A-S. & Van Damme, D.
evaluator: Seddon, M., Van Damme, D., Graf, D.L., Appleton, C. & Bennett, L.
